item.title: About
item.description:
hi, i am Ajay #

a backend developer focused on go, apis, and distributed systems.

currently building scalable services and experimenting with new tech. i like clean code, simple solutions, and systems that don’t fall apart at 3am.

what i work with #

languages: go, c++, typescript
backend: go (robfig/cron), node.js, express
tools: git, linux, docker

when i’m not building #

  • solving problems on codeforces
  • contributing to open-source
  • reading technical blogs
  • probably debugging something

connect #

  • github: github.com/aj4y7
  • linkedin: linkedin.com/in/ajaymishra7
  • codeforces: codeforces.com/profile/aj4y

feel free to reach out for collabs, questions, or just to chat about tech.

i haven’t written any articles yet…

but when i do, they’ll probably be about go, cpp, algos, distributed systems, or debugging nightmares at 3am.

check back soon, or follow me on github for updates.

item.title: projects
item.description:
classec #

status: completed • finished: oct 2025

college class alert system that sends automated push notifications 15 minutes before each class. built with go, robfig/cron for scheduling, and ntfy.sh for notifications. reads timetables from csv and handles section-specific topics.

github.com/Aj4y7/classec

itembeacon #

status: in progress • started: sep 2025

lost & found web application for college students. typescript/node.js backend complete with authentication and item tracking. currently seeking frontend contributors to build the ui.
